actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 216.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal building located at 78 Center Street in Pittsfield, Massachusetts, as the "Silvio O. Conte Federal Building", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates the Federal building at 78 Center Street, Pittsfield, Massachusetts, as the Silvio O. Conte Federal Building.
